11 years ago before she opened the shop,

they were going to find a way out,

find a way to pay the debt
to continue with life.

And so Yoon Cho decided
she had to find a way.

She had some relatives that

and she decided to open--

She decided to open a stall.

When she took over a stall

So eventually she decided to

Through her stall, through
